title: Factorial Calculation Function
description:
FACT calculates the factorial of X. 
It is defned for input values from 0 .. 12. For values less than zero and
greater than 12 is the result -1. For the factorial of larger numbers, the
GAMMA function is suitable.
For natural numbers X: X! = 1*2*3...*(X-1)*X, 0! = 1
Faculties of negative or non-whole numbers are not defned.
name: FACT

input.name: X
input.description: The integer input for which the factorial is to be calculated.

output.name: FACT
output.description: Returns the factorial of the input integer X, or -1 if the input is out of valid range.

return_value.description: The factorial of the integer X or -1 if X is out of the acceptable range.
